title: BRAND NEW GUT REHAB! 3 bedroom & 2 bath unit
posting_body: We have two other units with 1& 3 bedrooms available in this building.
3 bedroom,2 bath unit on two floors (first and basement).
The unit is completely renovated and features Bosch appliances, in-unit laundry, and more.
Located in Packard's Corner right by the green line station (B Line) in Allston.
Off-street parking is available for rent.
Driveway fits 3 cars for an additional $700/month.
Dogs are considered on a case-by-case basis for an additional $150/month.
Easy access to the train station, bus lines, restaurants, stores, and shops.
Tenants responsible for water and sewer payments.
